BBEX3.A.BDT.USD.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Bangladesh / USD 1 = BDT ... (selling)
General: Units of account for larger amounts: 1 lakh (in digits: 1,00,000) = 100,000 taka; 1 crore (in digits: 1,00,00,000) = 100 lakh = 10,000,000 taka.
Source: Since August 2010: The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited, Dhaka. June 2003 - July 2010: Standard Chartered Bank, Dhaka. January 1990 - May 2003: Bangladesh Bank, Dhaka.
Methodology: Until 2002, calculated on the basis of daily exchange rates, and from 2003 on the basis of month-end rates.
